phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The Clover Kingdom fell under attack while the Wizard King was absent.
The royal capital was in flames, and people fled from the dead.
You are stronger than me, right?
There are people out there who need our help!
Where do you plan to go?
We do not even know the full situation yet, and you cannot sense magic at all!
I am going to where it is noisiest!
D-Do you think you are an animal or something?!
Let us see what you have got!
Wait for me, Asta, my rival!
I am sure you would rather not take orders from me, but listen well, Magic Knights!
I will go after Leo and that Black Bulls boy,
and after I have joined them, we will head to the north district.
Silver Eagles, I ask that you head to the central district,
Blue Roses, head to the east district!
I would rather not take orders from a man, but I suppose I do not have a choice.
Golden Dawn, split into two teams and head to the west and northwest districts!
I guess we will just have to save dessert for later.
If we fail to protect the royal capital, we will bring shame upon the Magic Knights!
Do not let the enemy escape, no matter what!
Do you like the Clover Kingdom?
The members of the Magic Knights moved out,
I would always close my eyes
Of just making excuses to give up
I do not want to be near you
(The decisive battle is still a long way off)
I will give up on giving up
And get the world on my side
I am looking for the reason I am alive
Every time somewhere under this sky
And head where the light shines
I want to keep my promise
I will deliver it to you
Someone finally shows up, and it is a Black Bull.
And a little kid to boot.
Get away from her, you crazy bastard!
You will not be able to stop my army with that rusty sword!
It is dangerous, so stand back.
You are the one with the anti-magic.
No one asked the bottom-ranked Black Bulls
or a piece of trash like you with no magic
Do not think you are going to get away with...
I will give it to you, just
Captain of the Silver Eagles Nozel Silva
Member of the Silver Eagles Solid Silva
The Magic Knights have come to save us!
Member of the Silver Eagles Nebra Silva
Every time we knock them down, they get up again!
I was planning to have dessert when we got back, but I think I have lost my appetite.
Whoa, these things are gross, Sis!
I feel nauseous just looking at them.
Also, be mindful of your tone.
Oh, I will be more careful!
Do they have some kind of weakness?
There is no point in wasting time trying to find it.
We can look for the Black Bulls boy later, Leo.
These things possess magic, but they are not alive.
We will just have to crush them until they cannot get back up!
See if you can take my magic!
Steel Creation Magic: Fierce Spiral Lance!
Goodness, you fight in such a vulgar manner.
Sand Creation Magic: Sand-Armored Heavy Guard!
If you are hurt, please come see me!
I will heal you with my Dream-Healing Flower Cradle.
Filthy creatures, stay away from me.
Earth Creation Magic: Raging Mother Goddess!
I will not allow anyone to touch me.
Briar Creation Magic: Corpse-Hunting Briar Trees!
Water Creation Magic: Slashing Sea Serpent!
Punishment for the crime of daring to threaten the people
Do not tell me he managed to mow down that many of them with just a sword!
What a stupidly straightforward way of fighting!
This is why he is my perfect rival!
My magic runs my own mana through corpses,
making them move in any way I want.
That guy's attacks instantly cut through the mana in the corpses and erases it!
I guess that is all of them.
It is too early to thank me.
Why are you attacking innocent people, you jerk?!
I am going to defeat you, no matter what!
Everyone who does not understand my magic...
Why are you attacking innocent people, you jerk?!
I am going to defeat you, no matter what!
Everyone who does not understand my magic...
They keep coming, one after another...
But they are no match for me.
I will treat you to some gelato later.
Take that, and that, and that, and that!
Water Creation Magic: Holy Water Bullet!
That brat's your prey this time, Jimmy!
You just keep bringing out these creepy things one after another!
My wound opened up even more?
Jimmy got you with one of his specially made curse shells.
It is loaded with curse power.
Even scratches will not stop bleeding.
I would be real careful if I were you.
I will not be able to swing my big sword fast enough!
You sure are a pain for a brat that does not have any magic.
But Jimmy's still got lots of curse power left.
Oh, but before we deal with you...
Jimmy, finish off that eyesore of a brat back there first!
I guess you Magic Knights protect the people.
There is no point in getting hurt just to protect others, is there?
What do you gain from protecting a little brat like that, you hypocritical loser?!
I will protect her, even if I do not gain anything from it!
and swing your sword around until you bleed to death, you moron!
You cannot even control your magic.
You have basically been exiled from the Silva family.
I am surprised you had the nerve to return to the Noble Realm.
you are not letting what your siblings said get to you, are you?
There is no time for that on the battlefield!
One wrong decision and a life could be lost!
You are standing here right now as a member of the Magic Knights!
If you joined the Magic Knights of your own free will,
then steel yourself and get stronger!
Being weak is nothing to be ashamed of.
He is the one who proved that to me!
If he can do it, I can also...
The weak will always die weak!
I will not make it in time!
I cannot bear to just sit and watch this.
I will help you, so you would better be grateful!
There is no way he can stop you if you can move freely.
Looks like you are back to normal.
Do not get so full of yourselves!
I shall assist you, my rival!
There is no need to thank me!
And I was going to do that anyway!
You do not fight like any other mage!
Do not let that ridiculous attack get to you, Jimmy!
Do not get cocky, you little brat!
My dry emotions gaze at the me from that day
(I cannot find a place to go)
Even the faintest light can still break through the darkness
And change the flow of time
In order to grasp my endless dream
If there is a path that I should choose
Until my life comes to an end
I will accept any pain that comes my way
(We can try again, we can try again)
Even if we cannot see tomorrow
Holding onto feelings too intense to voice
I will keep screaming them in my heart
So, you have not actually said your name in the show yet.
Could you tell us what it is?
(Hai, ore no namae wa Radesu desu.)
So where did you come from, Radesdes?
You do not need the des.
We do not need the des?
So your name is just Ra?
Well, you said there was no des.
I just mean you do not need the des.
It is Radesdes, but you do not need the des...
So if you take out all the des,
I am telling you that is not right!
You better remember that, you useless brats!
The Magic Knights are no match for me!
I, Rades, am the strongest of them all!
Black Clover, Page 23: The Crimson Lion King.
